name: itsme-aravind-govindhasamy
title: Welcome to Aravind APG's Portfolio
description: Created by Fahim - An Opensource starter Portfolio template with NextJS, React, Typescript, Tailwind and react-icons, feel free to use it as you wish ;). Make sure to update the author section and description sections accordingly

author.name: Aravind G
author.like: Inspired by this portfolio? Create yours for free (it’s open source)!
author.bio: I am Aravind G, a backend software developer with expertise in web application development, IoT RFID solutions, and backend services. My technical skills include proficiency in Node.js, C#, Python, SQL, and API development. I have practical experience working with RFID technology and MySQL stored procedures, and I continuously explore opportunities in cybersecurity, backend development, and IoT. With a strong educational background and a passion for technology, I am eager to grow and take on new challenges. Let’s connect!
